snippet: David Clarkson scored on a deflection in the third period and the Devils rallied to defeat the Flyers. In other action, the Ducks topped the Red Wings.
abstract: New Jersey Devils beat Philadelphia Flyers, 5-3; other NHL scores noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JEFF Z. KLEIN

lead_paragraph: David Clarkson scored on a deflection in the third period and the Devils rallied to defeat the Flyers. In other action, the Ducks topped the Red Wings.

headline.seo: Devils Rally Past Flyers and Ducks Top Red Wings
headline.main: Devils Rally Past Flyers; Ducks Top Red Wings
